name: part_001
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE2【チラ見せ】 [4C3kreEOk1Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Commercial for Good Smile Company's 'The Last Frontier' scale figures featuring Hoshimachi Suisei and AZKi.
Commercial for FuRyu Prize items, showcasing various hololive merchandise like plushies and figures.
Commercial for UNDONE x hololive SUPER EXPO 25 collaborative watches.
Commercial for iPASS (Taiwan travel card) featuring hololive 6th fes. designs.
Commercial for JOYSOUND X1 karaoke system.
A compilation of fan messages for hololive 6th fes. 'Color Rise Harmony' and attendee information.

subtitles.original: グッスマ
subtitles.english: GoodSma

subtitles.original: hololive 5th fes. で歌われた名曲
subtitles.english: The masterpiece sung at hololive 5th fes.

subtitles.original: The Last Frontier からなんと！
subtitles.english: From 'The Last Frontier' comes...!

subtitles.original: フィギュア化決定！
subtitles.english: Figure production confirmed!

subtitles.original: あの感動をもう一度...
subtitles.english: Experience that emotion once again...

subtitles.original:
1/7スケールフィギュア化決定
星街すいせい　AZKi
subtitles.english:
1/7 scale figure production confirmed
Hoshimachi Suisei, AZKi

subtitles.original: フリューから『ホロライブ』プライズが全国アミューズメント施設に続々展開中！
subtitles.english: FuRyu 'hololive' prizes are now appearing in amusement centers nationwide!

subtitles.original: 4月からは新たにひっかけフィギュアも登場！
subtitles.english: New 'Hikkake' figures will also be available starting in April!

subtitles.original: フリュー
subtitles.english: FuRyu

subtitles.original: 台湾旅行中、最も便利な決済サービスを提供します。
subtitles.english: We provide the most convenient payment service for your travels in Taiwan.

subtitles.original: 新商品まもなく登場！
subtitles.english: New products coming soon!

subtitles.original: Color Rise Harmony 一卡通限定盲包
subtitles.english: Color Rise Harmony iPASS Limited Blind Bags

subtitles.original: 歌いたい曲が入っていなかった…
subtitles.english: The song I wanted to sing wasn't there...

subtitles.original: だったら JOYSOUND X1 で歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: In that case, let's sing with JOYSOUND X1!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1! ONLY NUMBER ONE!
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1! ONLY NUMBER ONE!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1! 曲数 NUMBER ONE!
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1! Number one in song count!

subtitles.original: AIが採点 絶賛 カラオケ最高最高！
subtitles.english: AI scoring, highly acclaimed, karaoke is the best, the best!

subtitles.original: 曲数No.1 歌いたい曲があるって最高
subtitles.english: Number 1 in song count! It's the best to have the songs you want to sing

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
subtitles.english: Attention: For Visitors

subtitles.english: Cheering loudly is OK
